As well as can use multiple supply voltage (MSV) design, power shutoff (PSO) synthesis and dynamic voltage frequency scaling (DVFS) synthesis to optimize the design for low-power.
5e64039c-6e67-4119-a62c-f7f2ae8d5f5b.name: Low-Power Synthesis Flow with Genus Stylus Common UI v22.1 Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the course.
Score 96% or greater to pass the exam

aba0c23f-4cd5-409c-9964-8b60311bb3dc.description: The earner of this badge can demonstrate an understanding of what power integrity, signal integrity, electromagnetic simulation, thermal analysis, and RF/mmWave design encompasses. They can apply applications, technologies, and industries to each specific analysis function. And they can then place analytical functions within the proper design and verification flow for any particular device or system being worked on. They understand what types of analysis are most relevant in which industries.
aba0c23f-4cd5-409c-9964-8b60311bb3dc.name: MSA Definition, Overview, and Flow

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the introductory course.  Pass the following assessments with a score of 100%:  Analysis Flow Assessment,  Analysis Flow Assessment, What is MSA Assessment.

84d59363-f2bf-480b-b255-08c9da1339a6.description: The earner of this badge learnt the Periodic Steady State (pss) and Quasi-Periodic Steady State (qpss) Analyses using the Shooting Newton method for simulating various circuits in the Spectre RF simulator. Also, the questions in this badge exam focus on various simulation methods for Oscillators and Driven Circuits, and various Small-Signal Analyses like Periodic AC (pac), Quasi-Periodic AC (qpac), Specialized pac Analyses like Rapid IP3/Rapid IP2, Compression and IM2 Distortion Summary.
84d59363-f2bf-480b-b255-08c9da1339a6.name: Spectre RF Analysis Using Shooting Newton vSPECTRE21.1/ICADVM20.1 Exam

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Spectre RF Analysis Using Shooting Newton Method course.
Must score 96% or greater on exam

bda05004-9267-4027-9f68-585ec7245129.description: The earner of this badge can understand the Cadence Metric Driven Verification (MDV) methodology & apply it in a verification project. They can set up the vManager server profile, launch tool, use vManager Planning to create a verification plan, create regression runs with Verification Session Input File, perform runs analysis, perform metrics and coverage analysis using Analysis Center. They are able to use Web dashboard, vAPI and can generate project reporting and charting in Tracking Centers.

2413f952-624e-4fa3-a501-ce0ccef51fa8.description: The earner of this badge can use the Cadence Voltus IC Power Integrity Solution software with Stylus CUI to run static and dynamic power and rail analyses and debug the results.
